additional_info:
Storeroom, Wardrobe, Furniture, Technique, Intercom, Telephone, Internet, Cable-TV, Security, Alarm System, Heating system: central, gas, electricity, Hot water: gas 
 Newly renovated flat for sale in Tbilisi, Tsinamdzgvrishvili street, on the second floor of two store building, completely refurbished, 57 sq.m. Big, bright, apartment with high ceilings, has large living room, separate kitchen and bedroom, bathroom, has 10 sq.m. basement and a large balcony, parking in the yard. The apartment has completely changed and updated electrical wiring and water pipes, with central heating and air conditioning. The apartment is equipped with high quality modern furniture and appliances: new cabinets, refrigerator, stove, washing machine, dishes and other household appliances, sofa, table, 42-inch Phillips TV, air conditioning, bedroom furniture, bathroom with the new, modern design. The apartment has lot of storage cabinets, has a nice, wide balcony. The apartment has the best location in the city center, a few minutes away from the subway station, nearby supermarkets 'Fresco' and 'Carrefour', easily accessible by the transport. Beautiful, ready to live in, modern apartment in the city center.
